head_office_address: Ground Floor, Viewmount House, Viewmount Park, Dunmore Road
eu_initiatives: All legislation, policy and initiatives relating to North East Atlantic Fisheries especially in EU North West Waters.
organisation_name: Irish South & East Fish Producers Organisation (IS&EFPO)
subsection: Non-governmental organisations, platforms and networks and similar
relevant_communication: Along with the Industry we receive regular updates from NWWAC via e-mail re fishing activity proposals.
goals__remit:
The Irish South & East Fish Producers Organisation represent fishermen at EU and National Level.  We keep our members informed of updated legislation and policy changes.    
Our goals are to help members get better value for their catches.
